entry.title: Mortal Koils Premade Coils
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Coil
Price: 14.99

Pick up your pack of Mortal Koils for any rebuildable device right over here! Measuring at a width of 3mm, they fit in most RDAs, RDTAs, RTAs, & RBA decks. On top of that, they fit in most sub-ohm tank decks provided they have the RBA adapter and each purchase comes with a few coils so you'll be equipped for a while!

  • Framed Staples: Good for hot vapes and offer huge flavour.
  • Aliens are a good all around coil. They give off a crackling sound, and have better flavour and clouds.
  • Mohawks: Great flavour and clouds. As they can be a bit tricky to install, they are more appropriate for experienced installers looking for attractive coils.

The are handmade out of Nichrome 80 (nickel chromium) which has been used for voltage and wattage control for many years. They run at 0.25 ohms and so will safely operate in many sub-ohm devices, even at higher wattages.

Both Small and large orders are hand built and made to perfection with the cleanest wire, and then put in to a UV disinfection box after packaging to ensure the cleanest product we can deliever to you for your safety.

It is advised to have a knowledge on Ohm's Law as well as battery safety before operating any variable vaping device.

There are two types of Nord 2 pod: Nord 2 RPM Pod and Nord 2 Nord Pod, which are compatible with the coils of the RPM & Nord Series' respectively. The SMOK Nord 2 Cartridge offers more pod and coil options to bring you powerful and diverse vaping fun!

entry.title: Vaporesso NRG GT Coils (3 Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Coil
Price: 9.99 - 12.49 (7 variants)

These coils were designed to fit the Vaporesso NRG tank series & the GT Core line features a vertical clapton coil design for improved flavor and airflow.

  • GT2 (0.4ohm) - Rated for 40-80 watts, these coils work best at 55-65 watts.
  • GT4 (0.15ohm) - Rated for 30-70 watts, these coils work best at 45-60 watts.
  • GT6 (0.15ohm) - Rated for 40-130 watts, these coils work best at 70-90 watts.
  • GT8 (0.15ohm) - Rated for 50-110 watts, these coils work best at 60-80 watts.
  • GT CCELL (0.5ohm) - Rated for 25-35 watts.
  • GT CCELL2 (0.3ohm) - Rated for 35-40 watts.
  • GT Mesh (0.18ohm) - Rated for 50-85 watts.

entry.title: Uwell Crown 3 (III) Coils (4 Pack)

The Uwell Crown III Replacement Coils is a highly innovative performance atomizer technology with ergonomic Plug-Pull mechanism, for the Uwell Crown III Tank. It is specially made with Parallel Coil Structure, allowing optimal airflow directly into the core. The integration of large wicking ports allows faster ramp-up speed as well as well-balanced flavor recreation.

  • Parallel Coil Structure
  • Plug-Pull Replacement Coil Design
  • 0.25ohm SUS316 Parallel Coil - rated for 80-90W
  • 0.5ohm SUS316 Parallel Coil - rated for 70-80W

  • 100% Organic Cotton
  • Stainless Steel Construction

entry.title: Smok V12-Q4 Coil Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Coil
Price: 19.99

Note: These coils are for the TFV12 Cloud Beast King and will not fit any of the TFV8 or TFV4 series tanks, and they will not fit the TFV12 Prince.

The quadruple coils are made of Kanthal wire and packed with organic cotton, providing the amazing flavor and vapor production we have all grown to expect from SMOK. The V12-Q4 coils are rated between 60-190 watts (SMOK suggests the best performance of these coils is between 90-160 watts). 

Specifications:

  • Replacement coils for the TFV12 Cloud Beast King
  • Patented Quadruple coil design
  • 0.15 ohm resistance
  • Recommended 60-190W
  • Best at 90-160W

Contents:

  • 1 x 3 pack of SMOK V12-Q4 replacement coils

entry.title: Uwell Crown Replacement Pods 2/PK
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Coil
Price: 9.99

Designed with ultimate quality, durability and reliability in mind, these Uwell Crown Replacement Pods are a set of high-quality refillable pods featuring an innovative airflow control switch and a generous 3 ml freebase e-liquid/NicSalt capacity.

Refills are quick and easy thanks to their top-fill design (remove mouthpiece to access) and juice viewing window, and pods are secured in place by magnetic connection. In addition, these pod duos support MTL and DTL vaping, allowing you to toggle your draw preference for optimal flavor and personalized vapor production.
Product Features:
  • Pod Design: Parallel Dual Coil
  • Crown Pod Series: 0.6Ω and 1.0 DTL Coil
  • Pod Capacity: 3 ml
  • Fill Method: Top-Fill/Drip Tip
  • Pod Installation Method: Magnetic
  • Features: Adjustable Airflow, Juice Window, Pro-FOCS Flavor Testing Technology, Ergonomic Mouthpiece

entry.title: Aspire Breeze 2 Pod
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Coil
Price: 4.99

The ever popular AIO (All In One) device from Aspire, the Breeze, has been redesigned with an improved filling method. Introducing the Breeze 2 now with new features and a new pod style system. The same compact and ergonomic design but a more convenient pod system that holds 2ml of e-juice, or a slightly larger 3ml version. It still has an ergonomic design and still comfortable to hold. It also retainedretainsthe great U-tech coil technology ensuring you a flavorful vape.

Features:

  • ﻿Simple Operation
  • Refillable Pod System
  • Adjustable Airflow
  • Rechargeable 1000mAh onboard battery
  • 3.0 Capacity (ml)
  • 0.6Ω Coil pre-installed
